frame.name: FR_Reliance_on_expectation
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> takes a certain <fen>Expectation</fen> to be a reliable fact, such that their plans can be based on it. A <fen>Time_of_Eventuality</fen> for when the Expectation should hold can be expressed locally the LUs of that frame.
<ex></ex> <asf>Relation to fndata-1.5</asf> : Addition of the Time_of_Eventuality FE to the Reliance_on_expectation frame. </def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition: <def-root>An individual that considers the Expectation certain.</def-root>

FE.name: Expectation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The fact which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> depends on in planning for the future.
<ex>I think you should <t>count</t> <fex name="Expectation">on getting a paycut</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_Eventuality
FE.definition: <def-root>The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> expects the <fen>Expectation</fen> to occur. <ex>She <t>counts</t> on getting a pay raise <fex name="tim">next year</fex>.</ex></def-root>
